text:
The police on Thursday arrested Madhaiyan (48), a labourer, on the charge of raping a 20-year-old mentally challenged girl in Edappadi here.

She was alone at her house, as her parents were away for work. The police registered a case under Section 376 (rape) of IPC and arrested him. He has been lodged at Salem Central Prison.
title: Man held for rape of minor girl
